criterioBRequest.descripcionCriterio: Tener un número de artículos científicos en revistas indexadas en base de datos que cumplan con un proceso de revisión de pares externos y otros estándares internacionales.

produccionBibliograficaPOJO.titulo: Taxonomic status and phylogenetic position of Oxymycterus juliacae Allen 1900 (Rodentia: Cricetidae)
New morphological data and phylogenetic position of the rare short-tailed opossum Monodelphis ronaldi (Didelphimorphia: Didelphidae) with new records
Variación intraespecífica de Carollia brevicaudum y Carollia perspicillata (Phyllostomidae: Chiroptera) de Perú y Ecuador
Updated list of the diversity of mammals from Peru and a proposal for its updating
A new species of Thomasomys Coues, 1884 (Rodentia: Sigmodontinae) from the montane forests of northern Peru with comments on the "aureus" group
Small mammals from the seasonally dry tropical forests of the huallaga river basin and new records for san martín department, peru
First records of the bats Eumops bonariensis (Chiroptera: Molossidae) and Pteronotus fuscus (Chiroptera: Mormoopidae) in Peru
A preliminary review of Nephelomys albigularis (Tomes, 1860) (Rodentia: Cricetidae), with the description of a new species from the Peruvian montane forests
Diversity and distribution of mammals from Peru I: Didelphimorphia, paucituberculata, sirenia, cingulata, pilosa, primates, lagomorpha, eulipotyphla, carnivora, perissodactyla, and Artiodactyla
Range extension and phylogenetic relationships of Akodon josemariarguedasi (Rodentia: Cricetidae) with comments on the aerosus species group
Ontogenetic and secondary sexual dimorphism variation in Platalina genovensium (Chiroptera: Phyllostomidae)
Noteworthy records and distribution of Peruvian long-tongued bat, Platalina genovensium Thomas, 1928 (Chiroptera, phyllostomidae)
Bat diversity from the Río la Novia Conservation Concession, Ucayali, Peru
Guía de identificación de fauna silvestre, para las autoridades ambientales de Amazonas, San Martín, Loreto y Ucayali. A review and notes about its importance
Geomorphometric analyses of the peruvian species of carollia (Chiroptera: Phyllostomidae)
Morphological differentiation of Carollia brevicauda and C. perspicillata (Chiroptera: Phyllostomidae) from Perú and Ecuador
First record of leucism in Glossophaga soricina valens (Phyllostomidae: Chiroptera) from Peru
